thread.title: British ambassador's car arrives at Russian foreign ministry - witness

title: British ambassador's car arrives at Russian foreign ministry - witness
text:
March 30, 2018 / 10:10 AM / Updated 26 minutes ago British ambassador's car arrives at Russian foreign ministry - witness Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
MOSCOW (Reuters) - The official car of the British ambassador to Moscow arrived at the Russian foreign ministry building on Friday, a Reuters camera operator at the scene said. British Ambassador to Russia Laurie Bristow leaves the Russian foreign ministry building in Moscow, Russia March 30, 2018. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov 
The Reuters camera operator said he saw the British ambassador, Laurie Bristow, in the car. The reason for the visit was not immediately clear and there was not immediate announcement from the British embassy. Reporting by Dmitry Madorsky; Writing by Christian Lowe
